caption: A man cautiously advances while holding a gun. He takes out a device and begins to take measurements. The man fires several shots and is suddenly attacked by a massive creature. His gun falls to the side as the man attempts to reach it, but the monster drags him away. The man and the creature wrestle with each other. Eventually, the man manages to retrieve his device. They navigate through the forest, with the man using a stick to cut something from the leaves and then wrapping it in the leaves. The man climbs up a rock, noticing flashes of light in the sky, so he takes out his device to measure. The woman hides among the trees and leaves. Suddenly, the man becomes trapped in a pile of fallen leaves and can't get out. He sinks deeper into the leaves, his head completely submerged. At this moment, the woman arrives and hands him a tree branch, which she uses to pull the man out of the leaves. Once the man is back on his feet, the two embrace tightly. The man then takes out his device again and gazes at the bright spots in the darkening sky.
